resources.title: Library of Babel
resources.description: there is a little concept, an idea that says : how would it feel like to live in a library, containing limited sized books, with every combination of characters possible, the library would be finite of course, but so big, our brains can't handle it, even though the number can still be written down on a finite sheet of paper, you can see that the library has all discussions of all kinds, every book written in the past , present, future, or those that won't be ever written, game dialogues, chatgpt prompts, chat gpt answers, basically anything, Breathtaking

resources.title: Chemix

resources.title: recommended youtube channel to learn c++

resources.title: Manim
resources.description: if you watched a youtube video from - three blue one brown - or you just are intrested in animtating mathematical equations, graphs ... etc, then you might be familiar with manim, an open source python libary in which you can do all of the previously mentioned things

resources.title: simple physics online simulator
resources.description: want to understand how mirrors, light and fluids work, are you intrested in understanding physics by visual experimentation, this website contains a full library of experiment that you can play one by one to understand your favorite topics

resources.title: freeConvert
resources.description: free and a recommended file conversion and compressions tool for everyday use

resources.title: sfx generator
resources.description: for game developers or sound designers, this tool can generate 8-bit sound effects for you to use in your game/website

resources.title: light Pollution map
resources.description: for astronomy enthusiasts, and stargazers, this website will let you check light polution in your area, and basically any other place in the planet, because light pollution is a cruicial factor when it comes to the quality of a stargazing night

resources.title: 16 personalities
resources.description: have an acurate test of your personality with this website, it feels like you are finally being understood

resources.title: If the Moon were only 1 pixel
resources.description: a tediously acurate map of the solar system, that shows how far appart our planets are, and how space is unimaginably huge, it took me personally 10 minutes to go through it all

resources.title: Mandelbrot set generator
resources.description: for those familiar with the mathematical concept, or those wanting to learn about it, this website visualized the mandelbrot set, a set of points on a 2D plan that verifies simple properties, but still gives a gorgeous result when rendered on screen

resources.title: public archive for space telesope images
resources.description: JWST, hubble, and many other missions, did a great job at taking pictures of the most distant objects in the sky , the images get processed before being shown to the public, well, did you know that the raw data are available for you to use ? using image processing software like Siril to strech the images, and Gimp to add mulitiple filters together, you can actually process the raw data by yourself and recreate Nasa's gallery pictures !

resources.title: orbital data bank
resources.description: Access all info related to the solar system object's orbits, in real time, for you projects

resources.title: satelite map
resources.description: check what satelite that will pass above your head this night!

resources.title: Wokwi, arduino and rasberryPi simulator
resources.description: as the title suggests, the website gives an accurate simulator for arduino and rasberryPI with all the electornic components available, from a bread board, led, joystick, transistors ... etc, best for prototyping

resources.title: understand fourrier transform
resources.description: this website uses intuitive animations to explain what happens behind the scenes when using fourrier transform methods to solve problems, in math, understanding how a method works is the best thing that can happen to a person
